name: Betrayal Explorer Stats
description:
Tired of dealing with the flimsy game pieces? Annoyed by the Haunt Chart? Try this app!

Features:
- Track stats for multiple explorers
- Easily find traitor and haunt by picking an Omen and Room. Only haunt name, number, and traitor are shown - no spoilers about the haunt
- Supports original Betrayal board game, Widow's Walk expansion, and Balder's Gate remake
